Descendant (space), Child (>), Adjacent Sibling (+), General Sibling (~)

block, inline, inline-block, flex, grid, none (controls layout behavior)
static, relative, absolute, fixed, sticky (position: absolute is relative to nearest positioned parent)

display: flex; flex-direction, justify-content, align-items, flex-wrap
vw (width), vh (height), vmin, vmax (relative to viewport size)

transform: translate(), rotate(), scale(), skew() (2D/3D transformations)

cover, contain, fill (controls how images/videos fit containers)
px, em, rem, %, vh/vw, ch, ex (relative vs absolute units)
